𒂠 ĜIR₁₅ 𓄂 𓂝 𓀀 => 𒂠𒊩 ϣⲉⲣⲓⲛ̀ⲟⲩⲣⲱ šeriǹourō "princess" @ shar 𒂠 ĜIR₁₅ ≈ gi7 𒂠 ≈ egir2 𒂠 ≈ egir3 𒊩𒂠 ≈ 𒎏 egi2 𒊩𒂠 ≈ 𒎏 egi3 𒆠𒊕 "princess"

ˢouro Horus Saurus

ⲟⲩⲣⲟ , ϥ. ⲟⲩⲣⲱ , pl. ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲟⲩ m king, f. queen (ⲟ=𐤏) ⇔ Zar syrer

𓅭𓇳

𒇽𒋗𒌓𒊕 | ˢEunuch | ⲥⲓⲟⲩⲣ siour סָרִיס sarís 𒌓 / ☼ / 𓅭𓇳 sir zar !? ( 𒋗𒌓 cheiro/sū́ra/सूर )

𒂗 𒂗𒂗 EN EN.EN lord of lords, king of kings

𒌋𒌋 man •Amun shar² ☾☾ տարի tari 𒋫
𒌋𒌋 •caesar quasir xerxes shar² king of kings ⇔ 𐏎 Ashur

𒊬𒊑 šar-ri shar:zar\king (𒋗𒉡 šu-nu sein/their )
𒊬𒊏𒊍 šar-ra-as ⇔ цари́ца caríca cȁrica (queen) Erika ⇔ koral Karl Carol
𒀭𒊬 𒂵𒉌 𒈗𒌷 Shar-kali-Sharri king of all kings
𒈗𒌷 Shar / Sharri (Akkadian)

𒋢𒄊 𓇓 𓂋 su-gìr > shar see 𒋢𒌦𒄊 su-un-gìr king

𒁹𒋡𒊒 tiz-qa-ru de'šahīr شَهِير ⇔ shar سرشناس saršenâs
𒁹𒋡𒊒 exalted, prominent

SAḤAR dust ≠ 𓊃𓀀𓏤 𒅖 sir syrer herr

ش ر ف sharif honor, noble => sir ≠ sheriff (scīrġerēfa shire + ġerēfa:Graf 𐌲𐌰𐌲𐍂𐌴𐍆𐍄𐍃 γρᾰ́φω )

𒄊 𒀴 Shakkanakku

šarru = Malku (king) in Kassite => malik

𒊬𒊏𒊍 šar-ra-as ⇔ цари́ца caríca cȁrica (queen) ⇔ koral Karl Carol

𒋢𒁍𒊑 su-pu-ri super… (increase)
𒍢𒋥 ṣi-rat < superaty exalted
